A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Star Wars movies and I think this is one of my favorite ones\, but there's a lot of problems with the trilogy. I think it's a bad trilogy because you don't feel a strong connection between the movies\, but this one is a good movie looking for itself. It makes you feel surprised with a lot of scenes and you feel the emotion from the start to the end\, that's incredible\, but I think it's important to have a good trilogy\, that's why I'm giving 7/10.
